title: HPE security advisory (AV25-477)
description: On August 1, 2025, HPE published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: HPE Private Cloud AI  versions prior to v1.5
HPE Telco IP Mediation  versions prior to 8.5.1-0B
HPE Telco Service Orchestrator  versions prior to v5.3.4
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
